info.document:
Bradley Wanamaker is officially the new member of Fenerbahce Dogus, as the club announced today.

By Eurohoops team/ info@eurohoops.net

The player who had a contract for next season with Darussafaka is transfered to Fenerbahce which on paper is more than ready to defend its EuroLeague title.

Bradley Wanamaker after a stellar last season with Darussafaka flirted with the NBA, but in the end he decided to join Fenerbahce which was tyring to lure him since the end of last season. This proved to be the crucial week for the final deal.

Wanamaker returned to Istanbul in order to be a player of Darussafaka and compete in the EuroCup under coach David Blatt, but in the end he will remain in EuroLeague and he will play under coach Zeljko Obradovic.
